 cepConfiguration (const string &filename)

Detailed Description

A drop in replacement for the original cepConfiguration. This implements a whiteboard pattern. Based on original code by Michael Still

Author:
Blake Swadling <blake@swadling.org>
Version:
Revision:
1.10

cepConfiguration::cepConfiguration (  const string &    filename )  [protected]
 

Constructor. this is protected to ensure that there can be only one.

Parameters:
filename  the canonical path to the config file
